title: How to Earn a Villager Badge in Animal Crossing: New Leaf

steps.headline: Spend time in your own village.
steps.description:
You can do things such as pulling weeds, fishing, planting trees, etc. Bronze rank: 50 hours of playing
Silver rank: 200 hours of playing
Gold rank: 500 hours of playing

steps.headline: Locate Phineas.
steps.description: When a player achieves the minimum for a level, Phineas will appear somewhere in town on clear days.

steps.headline: Talk to him.
steps.description: At times, he'll give you multiple badges, so just keep pressing buttons.

steps.headline: View your badge on your Town Pass Card.
steps.description: Learn that ranks override each other, so if you achieve a bronze, a silver one will override it instead of showing both ranks.

text:
Spend time in your own village. You can do things such as pulling weeds, fishing, planting trees, etc. Bronze rank: 50 hours of playing
Silver rank: 200 hours of playing
Gold rank: 500 hours of playing Accomplish the minimum amount required.  Locate Phineas. When a player achieves the minimum for a level, Phineas will appear somewhere in town on clear days. Talk to him. At times, he'll give you multiple badges, so just keep pressing buttons. View your badge on your Town Pass Card. Learn that ranks override each other, so if you achieve a bronze, a silver one will override it instead of showing both ranks.
